content: AMEX True Cashback Card POSB Everyday Card Lifestyle Travel Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 22 Jun 2018As a fresh grad, earning about $2.8k with a monthly spending of $1.2k and travels about once a year, I am looking to sign u for AMEX True Cashback card. Is it better as compared to POSB everyday?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 22 Jun 2018Depends on your spending categories. Amex true cashback is flat cashback for everything but POSB Everyday has higher rebates for petrol and groceries0 comments1

Xin YingLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 25 Jun 2018It depends on the categories which you spend more on and the merchants you frequent. Or you can have both cards, for those spending categories that POSB provides lower rebates with, use AMEX... 0 comments0

Brandan ChenLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Jun 2018It depends on what your spending habits are like.I just recently cancelled my True Cashback Card. This is because not many merchants accept Amex, hence I prefer to use SCB Unlimited Cashback0 comments0
